project_abstract.cdata: The objective of the Enhancing Fiscal Capacity to Promote Shared Prosperity Development Policy Loan for Colombia is to support the Government of Colombia in improving fiscal, territorial, and gender equity through specific actions in targeted policy areas, while enhancing access to information and accountability in public spending.  The main six main policy areas the Bank will be focusing are: (a) more equitable tax policy and administration; (b) inter-regional equity and broadening local revenue sources; (c) equity in social spending; (d) gender equity; (e) open access to national financial management information systems; and (f) monitoring of poverty and other social indicators.
